name: spo-update-people-web-part
title: Sample showing how to ensure that the Role/Title in each People web part is updated
shortDescription: Sample showing how to ensure that the Role/Title in each People web is updated
longDescription: Not entirely sure if the Role/Title field shown in the People Web part is supposed to be updated by MS on some sort of schedule. If that is the case this trigger either has an error or takes forever to be triggered. This script will ensure that the title is correct, at least for now.
